item.description: About me Hello, My name is Martin Smith, I am currently a software engineer student at Holberton School (Soon to be looking for work) developing my skills across the technical stack: front-end, back-end, database, DevOps, and low level. Prior to that, I was a 3D generalist with experience in using Maya, Houdini and other creative application to create digital media content, for games and small film projects.

Projects While you can look through my repository at the many projectect I’ve coded. These are a few of the one I personally proud of. IdeaDog Back-end, Front-end IdeaDog is a social web application for sharing ideas. Front-end of the application is built in React, with TypeScript, while the back-end runs on Rust. My task was to create the back-end while my partner Brennan D Baraban handled the front-end.
